items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). items.content_html: Wisp.js is a lightweight, extensible JavaScript class for building interactive, AJAX-driven, component-based UIs. It supports SPA-like navigation, SSR/partial hydration, polling, loading states, error handling, and custom event hooks.
